name: Southern California Edison - Preferred Shares
description: Southern California Edison (SCE) is one of the largest electric utilities in the United States, providing reliable and affordable electricity to over 14 million people across a 50,000-square-mile service area in Southern California. Founded in 1887, SCE is a subsidiary of Edison International and plays a critical role in the transition to a clean energy future. The company is committed to reducing greenhouse gas emissions and increasing the use of renewable energy sources such as solar, wind, and hydroelectric power. SCE is actively investing in modernization of its infrastructure, including smart grid technology, to enhance the reliability and efficiency of its service while improving customer experience. SCE's preferred shares represent a stable investment opportunity for shareholders seeking income, as they typically offer dividends that are prioritized over common stock dividends. The company is also involved in various community initiatives aimed at promoting energy efficiency and sustainability. Southern California Edison’s mission is to provide safe, reliable, and clean energy while supporting the economic growth and environmental stewardship of the communities it serves.
